name: Royal-Born
description: Born into Hell's aristocracy, you command respect and fear. High starting power and influence, but low empathy and susceptibility to corruption.

name: Hellborn Native
description: Born in Hell but not royalty. Balanced stats with strong resilience to corruption. A solid foundation for any path.

name: Weak Sinner
description: A human soul damned to Hell. Low starting stats but highest growth potential and empathy. The redemption path starts here.

name: Deal Immigrant
description: You made a Faustian bargain to enter Hell. Start with contract magic and a mysterious clause that can be exploited or backfire.

name: Fallen Angel
description: A rare angelic exile or accidental descent. Access to divine powers but hunted by both sides. Unlockable through special events.
